name: Secret Files: Sam Peters

reviews.review_text: Due to its extreme shortness and the absence of the main characters, Sam Peters feels more like a bonus content for Secret Files 3 than a full member of the frenchise. Still, I found the game rather enjoyable. Just don't buy it at the full price, because it's obviously overpriced, given the laughable amount of the content.

If you loved the original Secret Files, you'll enjoy this little midquel: Sam Peters from SF2 returns in her own adventure. Solid voice-acting, pretty locations, nice puzzles. True, Sam's character isn't as sympathetic as Nina and the game's quite short but it's worth checking out. Wait for the next sale and get it cheaper.
To short for the price... only about 1 and a half hour until the game is finished..
Typical Secret Files game, but very short and very easy. Better take the titles from the main series.
